mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS gw_api_log_${yyyyMMdd} like gw_api_log
mapper.insert: insert into gw_api_log_${yyyyMMdd} (id, uri, userAgent, ip, inTime, outTime, status, appId, userId, message) values (#{id}, #{uri}, #{userAgent}, #{ip}, #{inTime}, #{outTime}, #{status}, #{appId}, #{userId}, #{message})
